document_data.name: Oakwaters
document_data.mainbody: '''Oakwaters''' was a bathing pool open to the public located in the city of [[Daerlun]] in [[Sembia]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The pool was located in the north section of the city near the [[House of Firehair]].
document_data.Description: At roughly {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} in diameter, Oakwaters was quite large and rivaled the pond found in the nearby [[Wild Wood]] in size.
